job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* 𝐏𝐑𝐎𝐉𝐄𝐂𝐓 𝟏 : Recently started a long-term project to modernize our list trading system using modern C++ features and programming practices.
     * Working in a C++ environment on Windows and Linux platforms, enhancing and maintaining backend servers (C++) used for real-time trading applications, contributing during all phases of the project lifecycle, working with business counterparts to provide technical solutions to client needs, working with QA and supporting teams to address issues that arise during development and testing;
     * 𝐏𝐑𝐎𝐉𝐄𝐂𝐓 𝟐 : This role will work primarily within our Treasury and Mortgage trading product groups. These products cover two of the most liquid asset classes in the world.

   Tradeweb is a market leader in providing innovative capabilities to some of the largest Investment Banks, Asset Managers, and Hedge Funds in these areas.

   The Developer will work in a C++ environment on the Windows platform and enhance and maintain backend servers (C++) used for real-time trading applications.

   𝐏𝐑𝐎𝐉𝐄𝐂𝐓 𝟑 : In this role the work is done with a substantial codebase, requiring an inquiring and tenacious approach to development and maintenance.

   You'll need to implement code for interfacing with the Tradeweb Dealer Pricing System and Tradeweb Trading System. The Pricing Group develops distributed systems for publishing real-time Market Data.

   This group makes use of several 3rd party tools to distribute, store and retrieve market data TW LLM infrastructure, Tervela TMX, OneTick Database.
job_details.full_text:
C++ Developer

* 𝐏𝐑𝐎𝐉𝐄𝐂𝐓 𝟏 : Recently started a long-term project to modernize our list trading system using modern C++ features and programming practices.
     * Working in a C++ environment on Windows and Linux platforms, enhancing and maintaining backend servers (C++) used for real-time trading applications, contributing during all phases of the project lifecycle, working with business counterparts to provide technical solutions to client needs, working with QA and supporting teams to address issues that arise during development and testing;
     * 𝐏𝐑𝐎𝐉𝐄𝐂𝐓 𝟐 : This role will work primarily within our Treasury and Mortgage trading product groups. These products cover two of the most liquid asset classes in the world.

   Tradeweb is a market leader in providing innovative capabilities to some of the largest Investment Banks, Asset Managers, and Hedge Funds in these areas.

   The Developer will work in a C++ environment on the Windows platform and enhance and maintain backend servers (C++) used for real-time trading applications.

   𝐏𝐑𝐎𝐉𝐄𝐂𝐓 𝟑 : In this role the work is done with a substantial codebase, requiring an inquiring and tenacious approach to development and maintenance.

   You'll need to implement code for interfacing with the Tradeweb Dealer Pricing System and Tradeweb Trading System. The Pricing Group develops distributed systems for publishing real-time Market Data.

   This group makes use of several 3rd party tools to distribute, store and retrieve market data TW LLM infrastructure, Tervela TMX, OneTick Database.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional C++ software development, backend server enhancement, and maintenance within a financial trading system. There is no mention of AI, machine learning, generative models, or related technologies. The mention of 'TW LLM infrastructure' appears to be a specific internal tool name rather than a general requirement for LLM expertise, and the context does not suggest its use in a generative AI capacity. Therefore, it does not fit the profiles of ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer and is best classified as Ambiguous.

job_tasks.justification: The description repeatedly mentions 'modern C++ features and programming practices', 'enhancing and maintaining backend servers (C++)', 'implement code for interfacing', and working 'in a C++ environment on Windows and Linux platforms', all of which are core software development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: modern C++ features and programming practices

job_tasks.justification: The role involves working with a 'substantial codebase' and requires 'development and maintenance', which are fundamental software engineering tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: substantial codebase, requiring an inquiring and tenacious approach to development and maintenance

job_tasks.justification: Implementing code for interfacing with specific systems ('Tradeweb Dealer Pricing System and Tradeweb Trading System') is a direct software development task.
job_tasks.phrase: implement code for interfacing with the Tradeweb Dealer Pricing System and Tradeweb Trading System

job_tasks.justification: The role requires 'working with business counterparts to provide technical solutions to client needs', indicating a need to understand business requirements and translate them into technical solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: working with business counterparts to provide technical solutions to client needs

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'enhancing and maintaining backend servers (C++) used for real-time trading applications', which is a core software development responsibility for production systems.
job_tasks.phrase: enhancing and maintaining backend servers (C++) used for real-time trading applications

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'contributing during all phases of the project lifecycle' implies involvement in the full software development process.
job_tasks.phrase: contributing during all phases of the project lifecycle

job_tasks.justification: Working with 'QA and supporting teams to address issues that arise during development and testing' is a standard part of the software development lifecycle.
job_tasks.phrase: working with QA and supporting teams to address issues that arise during development and testing

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'develops distributed systems for publishing real-time Market Data' suggests involvement in building systems that might involve data processing or modeling, though the primary focus remains software development.
job_tasks.phrase: develops distributed systems for publishing real-time Market Data

soft_skills.phrase: inquiring and tenacious approach to development and maintenance
working with QA and supporting teams
